newsitem.title: USA: Concentra sees Q1 loss from project delays.
newsitem.headline: Concentra sees Q1 loss from project delays.

text.p: Concentra Corp said on Tuesday it expects to report a significant loss for the first quarter ended June 30 because of project delays.

Lawrence Rosenfeld, Chairman and Chief Executive Officer, commented, "Currently the bulk of our business is being driven by two to three very large contracts each quarter. A number of our largest projects have been delayed, resulting in a significant operating loss."
The company expects revenues for the first quarter of approximately $4.0 million compared with $5.1 million for the same period a year ago.
Results for the quarter are expected to be announced during the week of July 21.
Rosenfeld added, "Our goal is to transition our business model to a larger set of smaller transactions which will make our business results more predictable."
Concentra provides object-oriented sales and engineering software solutions for empowering the knowledge-based organization.
